```{r setup, include = FALSE}
library(leaflet)
library(tidyverse)
library(USAboundaries)
library(mappingelections)

meae_id <- "{{meae_id}}"
votes <- vote_counts(meae_id)
aggregates <- aggregate_party_votes(votes)
map_data <- join_to_spatial(aggregates)
```


</div>

```{r election-results, echo = FALSE}

```
